section-description: Opinions and insights from key opinion leaders and the front lines of care.

items.title: New Induction Standard for Acute Myeloid Leukemia

item-content.take-home-message: In a phase III trial of patients with acute myeloid leukemia, adding cladribine, but not fludarabine, to induction with daunorubicin/cytarabine significantly increased overall survival and can be considered a new standard of care.

referenced-item.title: Cladribine, But Not Fludarabine, Added to Daunorubicin and Cytarabine During Induction Prolongs Survival of Patients With Acute Myeloid Leukemia: A Multicenter, Randomized Phase III Study
